entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
